title: 6 Gardening Tips and Trick for Beginners

tasks.task: This seems comprehensive and includes all six tips as MAINTASKs, with subtasks that encapsulate the advice given. Each maintask is directly related to a tip in the original transcript, ensuring alignment. Since the transcript is about setting up a garden, the main tasks would each involve physical actions related to garden setup and care. For example, "choosing a suitable garden location" includes evaluating sunlight and space, which are aspects that a person has to physically assess. Similarly, selecting the correct growing medium and irrigation system involve tangible actions. While the motivational element might seem less physical, staying resilient and persistent could involve checking on the garden regularly, which is a physical activity.
